name: @gmod/cram
description: read CRAM files with pure Javascript

scripts.docs: documentation readme --shallow src/indexedCramFile.js --section=IndexedCramFile; documentation readme --shallow src/cramFile/file.js --section=CramFile; documentation readme --shallow src/craiIndex.js --section=CraiIndex;  documentation readme --shallow errors.js '--section=Exception Classes'; documentation readme --shallow src/cramFile/file.js --section=CramFile; documentation readme --shallow src/cramFile/record.js --section=CramRecord
scripts.built-tests: rm -rf built-tests; mkdir built-tests; ln -s ../test/data built-tests/data; babel test/*.js -d built-tests; babel test/lib/*.js -d built-tests/lib;babel test/lib/fasta/*.js -d built-tests/lib/fasta;node ./node_modules/.bin/mocha built-tests
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run build && cp dist/errors.js errors.js
scripts.postpublish: rm errors.js && git push origin master --follow-tags
